document.full_text: the european central bank held interest rates on thursday and is expected to signal a rise in july to tackle price pressures in the euro zone, where it faces pressure to help clear the way for a new greece bailout plan.
document.title: ecb holds rates, expected to signal july rise
lines_and_colors: the european central bank held interest rates on thursday and is expected to signal a rise in july to tackle price pressures in the euro zone, where it faces pressure to help clear the way for a new greece bailout plan.
